metadata.title: CVE-2023-52453 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:hisi_acc_vfio_pci: Update migration data pointer correctly on saving/resumeWhen the optional PRE_COPY support was added to speed up the devicecompatibility check, it failed to update the saving/resuming data pointersbased on the fd offset. This results in migration data corruption and whenthe device gets started on the destination the following error is reportedin some cases, [ 478.907684] arm-smmu-v3 arm-smmu-v3.2.auto: event 0x10received: [ 478.913691] arm-smmu-v3 arm-smmu-v3.2.auto: 0x0000310200000010[ 478.919603] arm-smmu-v3 arm-smmu-v3.2.auto: 0x000002088000007f [478.925515] arm-smmu-v3 arm-smmu-v3.2.auto: 0x0000000000000000 [478.931425] arm-smmu-v3 arm-smmu-v3.2.auto: 0x0000000000000000 [478.947552] hisi_zip 0000:31:00.0: qm_axi_rresp [error status=0x1] found [478.955930] hisi_zip 0000:31:00.0: qm_db_timeout [error status=0x400] found[ 478.955944] hisi_zip 0000:31:00.0: qm sq doorbell timeout in function 2

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52453` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-11-generic - 6.8.0-11.11
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-11-generic - 6.8.0-11.11
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-11-generic-64k - 6.8.0-11.11
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1001-aws - 6.8.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1001-azure - 6.8.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1002-gcp - 6.8.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1001-ibm - 6.8.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-7-lowlatency - 6.8.0-7.7.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-7-lowlatency-64k - 6.8.0-7.7.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1001-oracle - 6.8.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-1001-raspi - 6.8.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-realtime - 6.8.0-1008.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
